scripts.watch: npm run build && npm-run-all -p serve watch:html watch:js watch:css watch:images
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run copy:vendorjs && npm run copy:vendorfonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:images && npm run build:html
scripts.copy:vendorjs: mkdir dist/js && cp node_modules/highlight-within-textarea/jquery.highlight-within-textarea.js dist/js && cp node_modules/jsviews/jsviews.min.js dist/js && cp node_modules/json-editor/dist/jsoneditor.min.js dist/js && mkdir dist/js/sceditor && cp -R node_modules/sceditor/minified/ dist/js/sceditor && uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.js node_modules/bootstrap-slider/dist/bootstrap-slider.js node_modules/bootstrap-3-typeahead/bootstrap3-typeahead.js -m -c -o dist/js/vendor.min.js
scripts.swagger:docs: mkdir dist/swagger && cpx 'node_modules/swagger-ui/dist/**/*.*' dist/swagger && replace-in-file 'http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/swagger.json' 'http://localhost:8080/v2/api-docs' dist/swagger/index.html
scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf ../zols-cms-plugin/src/main/resources/templates && rm -rf ../zols-cms-plugin/src/main/resources/static && npm run package:static && npm run package:templates
